sentence: ***** Last Thursday, the FEC asked the campaign for Joe Kent, a Washington state Republican running for Congress, for more details about expenditures from the candidate's personal funds on behalf of the committee.? Kent's sole disbursement on the report in question was $10,600, which was described as In-kind: Travel, airfare, lodging, parking.? Tracking Trump The National Shooting Sports Foundation is returning to Trump's D.C. hotel for its annual import/export conference in August, according to an email the group sent potential attendees.
author: Zach Everson
title: Checks & Imbalances: NRA Campaign Filing Confirms Ransomware Attack
